šum-ma lu AGA.ÚS ù lu ŠU.HA ša i-na dan-na-at šar-ri-im tu-úr-⸢ru⸣ wa-ar-[k]i-šu A.ŠÀ-šu ù <sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub>-šu a-na ša-ni-im id-di-nu-ma i-li-ik-šu it-ta-la-ak šum-ma i[t]-tu-ra-am-ma URU-šu ik-ta-áš-dam A.ŠÀ-šu ù <sup>giš</sup>KIRI<sub>6</sub>-šu ú-ta-ar-ru-šum-ma šu-ma i-li-ik-šu i-il-la-ak
